Text: Disgusting movie. Never watched, never will.

Occasional Garbled audio and of course the usual shitty 96kbps audio.

@andylangholz - I am happy to know that ignorance is not always bliss. You need to get out of the idiot bubble you seem to be living in and first learn about homosexuality before you cast your ignorant judgement upon it.

Intolerance doesn't mean afraid. People use homophobic way too often and, usually, are ignorant of it's actual meaning. Don't worry I have no problem with homosexuals, just pointing out the ridiculous use of the word homophobic.
